item.description: Everywhere we turn these days, we have Tea-Party anti-government rants, Occupy Wall Street anti-corporate protests, and an acrimonious, divided government that can't seem to get much done.  With a political election year about to begin, we will turn toward the idea of Integral Politics and the possibilities it could offer for discourse in this time.  We will listen to and read an excerpt of political commentary from Ken Wilber and Robert Godwin, who are both integrally-informed thought leaders emphasizing different sides of the political divide.  We will follow with a discussion, attempting to embody left and right ideals and to reconcile them orthogonally to create something new.
item.name: Can Integral Consciousness Save Politics?
